name: beans on a plane
description:
use wasd to move on the plane, click to go in and out of plane, and catch birds from the sky!

trade with worker bean to get thiccer and logner plane, or get cheap wepons!

trade with warrior bean to summon bosses!

beat bosses to get weapons!

also falling off just kills you so dont do thattt

but you respwan

play with friends in beanplane

lol
